thread.title_full: Neighbor from hell feeds Shih Tzu to pit bulls | Daily Mail Online

author: Kaileen Gaul For Dailymail.Com
title: Neighbor from hell feeds Shih Tzu to pit bulls | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Neighbor from hell feeds woman's Shih Tzu Charlie Brown to a pack of PIT BULLS Marvin Riley, 30, admitted to throwing a Shih Tzu puppy over a fence to two pit bulls in Albuquerque The dog, Charlie Brown, was adopted by Bernadette Salazar six months ago and died in the attack Riley laughed while admitting the crime and faces felony animal cruelty charges Published: 01:09 GMT, 21 February 2017 | Updated: 07:48 GMT, 21 February 2017 90 shares
